newsitem.title: USA: Teleflex says ups qtly dividend to $0.20.
newsitem.headline: Teleflex says ups qtly dividend to $0.20.

text.p: Teleflex Inc said Friday it voted a two-for-one split of its common stock, in the form of a 100 percent stock dividend.
The company also said it will increase the quarterly cash dividend from $0.175 per share to $0.20 per share on the pre-split shares.
The company said it is a 14 percent increase over the previous rate.
The compamy said the quarterly cash dividend, giving effect to the split, is at a rate of $0.10 per share.
The stock dividend and the cash dividend are both payable June 16, to shareholders of record May 23.
The company said the total common shares outstanding will be approximately 36.3 million following the stock dividend.
